quizDescription: Test your knowledge of science fiction movies with this futuristic trivia quiz!

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie franchise follows the intergalactic adventures of a smuggler named Han Solo and his Wookiee co-pilot, Chewbacca?
questions.explanation: The 'Star Wars' franchise, created by George Lucas, is a space opera that has become a cultural phenomenon.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a cyborg assassin sent back in time to kill the mother of a future resistance leader?
questions.explanation: 'The Terminator' stars Arnold Schwarzenegger as the iconic cyborg assassin, also known as the T-800.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie follows a group of explorers who discover a mysterious black monolith on the Moon?
questions.explanation: '2001: A Space Odyssey,' directed by Stanley Kubrick, is a landmark film known for its visual effects and enigmatic storytelling.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie features a genetically engineered dinosaur theme park that goes awry?
options: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
questions.explanation: 'Jurassic Park,' based on Michael Crichton's novel, showcases cloned dinosaurs as the park's main attraction.

questions.question: Which sci-fi movie involves a time loop, with the protagonist reliving the same day repeatedly?
questions.explanation: 'Edge of Tomorrow,' starring Tom Cruise, follows a soldier caught in a time loop during an alien invasion.
